name: classicSYMBOL
description: Get those old symbols back. (Reuploaded from dA-Style since they deleted it. http://userstyles.org/users/175086 )
additional_info:
Found the original script. Original update notes from the deleted script:

"Stopped working - fixed!

Also fixed the colour issue in the favourites drop-down. Thanks kingofthedededes73!
And I fixed the colour issue in journals too! :D (And again, not all journals were affected)

There aren't any weird symbols for super groups and lifetime premiums anymore - awesome! Thanks to electricjonny and rotane for their help with this!

Deactivated and Banned users now have their symbols back, too!

Symbols now come up in the chats!

Structure has been changed, to minimise any chance of the style breaking in the future.

Symbols come up when you reply through the message center now! "
